title: person of interest || back to life
author: oh kay
description:
celebrating person of interest from cbs! the first 2 seasons are a true masterpiece of storytelling and world building for both the individual main characters and the dynamics between them. however, the later seasons (and parts of s2) were completely and fully ruined by root and shaw (who are literally #2 and #3 on my most hated characters of all time list). shaw was pointless from start to finish, and should never have existed. root should have had her 3 episode arc and then gone away and never returned. the show suddenly became just theirs, while our OGs got backburnered and overshadowed to hell, and rarely got to interact with each other ever again. it's just tragic, because finch, reese, carter, and fusco are so unique and in my top 10 fave list, while root and shaw are cliche, obnoxious, annoying, and truly boring little misses.

the song is "bring me back to life" by extreme music.
